summary: okay well now im gonna clutter your inbox with some bangers cos you opened pandoras box: Notable mentions but not really fitting...
question: okay well now im gonna clutter your inbox with some bangers cos you opened pandoras box: Notable mentions but not really fitting jackie - Akira (Clown Fight and Kaneda's theme). 90s Grunge is Daze n Daze - Misanthropic Drunken Loner and Self Destructive Anthem, Tito and Tarantula - angry cockroaches,  Death Proof - down in mexico, The Taxpayers - I love you like an alcoholic, and "sunglasses at night" (its just a good song lol). Some of these might fit, some not, but maybe you find one you like
answer:
Yes bring it on!

I will add these to my list and give them a listen. I’ll try and include some if they fit.

Thanks for the recommendations!!

body:
Cyberpunk 2077: Possum Springs Edition

“In 2077, they voted Possum Springs the worst place to live in America. Main issues: sky high rate of disappearances and more people living below the poverty line than anywhere else. Can’t deny it - it’s all true. But everybody still wants to live here. This town’s always got a promise for you. Might be a lie, an illusion, but it’s there…just around the corner…and it keeps you going. It’s a city of dreams. And I’m a big dreamer…”

Featuring Bea Santello as V.

summary: Could Cyberpunk 2077 Get A Release Date Soon?
title: Could Cyberpunk 2077 Get A Release Date Soon?
body:
When is Cyberpunk 2077 coming out? When will CD Projekt Red reveal the release date?

Cyberpunk 2077 is one of the most highly-anticipated games to be coming out in the somewhat near future. But the developer, CD Projekt Red, has been mum on when exactly it will release. However, on their website, they put up a job listing for a “Release Manager”:

“We’re looking for a quality-focused and well-organized Release Manager to support us on our current and upcoming projects and to take part in coordination of all global product releases. As release manager you will cooperate and communicate with all stakeholders from the CD Projekt involved in the release and take active part in organizing whole process. It includes submissions to first party console manufacturers, oversee compliance certification process and working with partners on publishing process on multiple platforms.”

This would seem to indicate that they are far enough along that they’re going to prepare for what comes next. And what comes next is the prep for the release. We know the game will be at E3, so perhaps a release date will be announced there.

Could Cyberpunk 2077 Get A Release Date Soon? was originally published on MMORPG Forums

summary:
Here’s the beginning of the next chapter for Valentino. Just a sneak peek to hopefully prove I haven’t forgotten about it!
V was...
body:
Here’s the beginning of the next chapter for Valentino. Just a sneak peek to hopefully prove I haven’t forgotten about it!



V was by the subway station waiting for her loud friend. She had woken up with a mighty hangover, and an ache all through her body. She really shouldn’t have drunk so much given her condition but hey, they say hindsight is 20/20. The memory of the evening was fuzzy at best, fragments of the three of them drinking and generally having a good time. Regardless of what happened last night, she had a meeting with the big man: Dextar DeShawn.


Leaning on the railing, V held her head in her hands, the sunglasses on her face doing little to help the throbbing in her head. She had celebrated the way she always does, last night was no exception, hopefully it wouldn’t affect her meet up with her ‘boss’. She just needed to get paid and get out. Whatever he had lined up next will have to wait a few more hours until V can can shake this hangover and think clearly.


“Yo V!” The booming voice of Jackie could be heard over the general hustle and bustle of the street. He came up and leant beside V on the railing, snapping her out of her thoughts.


“Not so loud Jack!” She kept her head down, starting to massage her temples.


“Ahh, so the great and powerful V is suffering a hangover! I didn’t even know that was possible!” He slapped her on the back in a congratulatory manner, “ya did good yesterday jaina! Stopping a deal like that ain’t easy and who knew that your new buddy was such a good shot? Had me worried for a moment there though.” Jackie moved his hand to V’s shoulder to massage some of the tension away. V just brushed him off.


“Yeah well, I told you you could trust him and you were such a dick to him!” V glanced sideways at her friend, “but…I’m glad you got along with him last night.” She wasn’t entirely sure if that was true but judging on how Jackie had just complimented Ghost, something good must have happened.
body_abstract: Here’s the beginning of the next chapter for Valentino. Just a sneak peek to hopefully prove I haven’t forgotten about it!

summary: Another scene from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! My Solo, Tessa, and our Netrunner, XP, were trapped inside a ship...
caption: Another scene from our latest Cyberpunk 2020 game session! My Solo, Tessa, and our Netrunner, XP, were trapped inside a ship while everything around them was exploding. Tessa had to punch the hell out of a locked bulletproof door and somehow managed to save us before it was too late. Amazing game, but so much anxiety… :’)

summary: Cyberpunk 2077: -Death is the Only Game Over
title: Cyberpunk 2077: -Death is the Only Game Over
body:
Cyberpunk 2077: -Death is the Only Game Over

The History of Mission Design 

Every game has them in some form or another: – The mission. It has its objectives and things the player must achieve to advance the story. One of game development’s must frustrating design blocks is mission design, and it plagues developers and gamers alike. Everyone remembers the insta-fail stealth mission from well… numerous Ubisoft titles come to mind. In CD…

View On WordPress
